Description.Text: Please note that the reception for these apartments is situated at Admon. Gimenez in Avda. Pau Casals, 74-76, with opening times 10am-1pm & 4pm-7pm. A refundable damage deposit of 100 Euros per apartment is required on arrival. Please note that cots are available at an extra charge of approximately 4 ? per night, payable locally.

The Turquesa apartments are just across the road from Aquapolic Water Park at La Pineda - a popular day out with everything from white-water rapids to safe play areas for younger children.The apartments are only a stone s throw away from the palm-fringed seafront promenade, the Passeig de Pau Casals, with its bars, street cafes and high-season children s shows and festivals.
